description: Deploy remote code, for example from GitHub.
summary: Deploy remote code, for example from GitHub.
examples: sfdx kratapps remote deploy start --repo-owner kratapps --repo-name component-library --source-dir src/main/default/lwc/spinner/
sfdx kratapps remote deploy start --repo-owner kratapps --repo-name component-library --metadata LightningComponentBundle:spinner
targetOrgFlagSummary: Login username or alias for the target org.
repoRefFlagSummary: Reference, could be a git branch name, rev, tag.
sourceDirFlagSummary: Path to the remote source files to deploy.
tokenFlagSummary: API token to the external service, e.g. GitHub API Token. Required for private repositories and to increase GitHub API request limit.
